SEARCH
Package risk.server.network

Klasse ClientRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
risk.server.network.ClientRequestHandler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Runnable
public class ClientRequestHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Handles incoming client requests and manages communication between clients and the game server. Implements the Runnable interface to run in a separate thread for concurrent handling of client requests.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ClientRequestHandler

      public ClientRequestHandler(Socket socket, RiskInterface risk, GameServer server)
      Constructs a ClientRequestHandler2 object. Initializes the handler with the provided socket, RiskInterface, and GameServer2 instances.
      Parameter:
      socket - The socket connected to the client.
      risk - The RiskInterface instance managing game logic.
      server - The GameServer2 instance handling server operations.

  • Methodendetails

    • getClientID

      public UUID getClientID()
      Retrieves the unique client ID assigned to this handler.
      Gibt zurück:
      The UUID representing the client ID.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the Player associated with this client handler.
      Gibt zurück:
      The Player object associated with the client.

    • stopListening

      public void stopListening()
      Stops listening to client requests and closes associated resources.

    • run

      public void run()
      Handles client requests on a separate thread. Listens for incoming messages from the client, processes them, and handles disconnection requests. Note: This method runs continuously until the client disconnects.
      Angegeben von:
      run in Schnittstelle Runnable

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to the client.
      Parameter:
      message - The message to send.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name, String color)
      Adds a new player to the game.
      Parameter:
      name - The name of the player to add.
      color - The color associated with the player.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String name)
      Removes a player from the game.
      Parameter:
      name - The name of the player to remove.

    • sendPlayerCountries

      public void sendPlayerCountries(String name)
      Sends country objects associated with a player to the client.
      Parameter:
      name - The name of the player for which country objects are sent.

    • makeAttack

      public void makeAttack(String fromCountry, String toCountry, String attacker, int numberOfUnits)
      Initiates an attack from one country to another.
      Parameter:
      fromCountry - The name of the attacking country.
      toCountry - The name of the defending country.
      attacker - The name of the player initiating the attack.
      numberOfUnits - The number of units used in the attack.

    • sendCountryData

      public void sendCountryData()
      Sends country data to all connected clients. Sends information about each country, including its name, owner, units, continents, and neighbors.

    • sendMissionCard

      public void sendMissionCard(String player)
      Sends a mission card description to the specified player.
      Parameter:
      player - The name of the player to send the mission card description.

    • sendUnitCards

      public void sendUnitCards(String player)
      Sends unit cards to the specified player.
      Parameter:
      player - The name of the player to send unit cards.

    • playerList

      public void playerList()
      Sends the list of players to the client. Sends each player's name, ID, and color.

    • sendPlayerOnTurn

      public void sendPlayerOnTurn()
      Sends information about the player currently taking their turn to all clients. Sends the ID of the player who is currently on turn.
